item.title: Global markets soar after President Trump's tariff pause
item.description: Stocks in Europe and Asia followed Wall Street's gains after Trump announced a pause on higher global tariffs, but investors are still waiting on Beijing's next move.

item.title: Aging former research chimps move to Chimp Haven
item.description: All of the former research chimpanzees that had been living on an Air Force base in New Mexico have finally arrived at a sanctuary in Louisiana. Many of these chimps are in their 50s and 60s.

item.title: A former hostage struggles with the return home
